item.title: My first blog post: Building a blog using node.js
item.description:
This is the first of many blog posts to come, documenting my progress in learning to develop software.

Today I created a simple blog-like application (not the one youâ€™re currently reading) using node.js, and deployed it on Heroku. You can find the GitHub repo for the project here.

The blog you are currently reading was made with Jekyll and hosted on GitHub Pages. I will continue to develop my node blog, but I will not post any updates to it for the time being.
